General.Name: Madrigal Pharmaceuticals Inc
General.Description: Madrigal Pharmaceuticals, Inc., a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company, focuses on the development of therapeutics for the treatment of non-alcoholic steatohepatitis (NASH) in the United States. Its lead product candidate is resmetirom, a liver-directed selective thyroid hormone receptor beta agonist, which is in Phase III clinical trials for treating NASH. The company is also developing MGL-3745, a backup compound to resmetirom. The company is headquartered in West Conshohocken, Pennsylvania.
General.Address: Four Tower Bridge, West Conshohocken, PA, United States, 19428
